metadata.title: Friday, 22nd Novemeber, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Youth and Sport how many youth clubs in Lukulu East and Lukulu West Parliamentary Constituencies have been funded in 2013.
Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when construction of township roads and drainages in Sesheke Township will commence;
(b)    what the cost of the project is; and

(c)    when the project will be completed. PRESENTATION OF GOVERNMENT BILLS The Minister of Finance The Competition and Consumer Protectio n (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Competition and Consumer Protection Act, 2010.                                                                                                                          (N.A.B. 15/2013) The Minister of Finance The Environmental Management (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Environmental Management Act, 2011.      (N.A.B. 16/2013) The Minister of Finance The Fees and Fines (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Fees and Fines Act.                                                       (N.A.B. 17/2013) The Minister of Finance The Patents and Companies Registration Agency (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Patents and Companies Registration Agency Act, 2010.                                                                                                                                                                             (N.A.B. 18/2013) The Minister of Finance The Weights and Measures (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Weights and Measures Act.                                 (N.A.B. 19/2013) ORDER OF THE DAY 1 Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate:(Head 20/04: under consideration): (Ms Imenda). Heads 20/06, 20/09, 29/01, 29/03, 29/04, 29/05, 29/06, 29/07, 29/09, 25/01, 77/01, 77/02, 77/03, 77/04, 77/05, 77/06, 77/08 and 77/09 - for consideration.
